item.title: Resources
item.description: My posts with some useful resources Git, GitHub and R Modeler’s Hippocratic oath Great posts | academic The Awesomest 7-year Postdoc by Radhika Nagpal | Scientific American Bioinformatics Microbial Bioinformatics Starter Kit by Lauren Cowley Microbial genome annotation by Michael Eisen Twitter thread & moment Tools for bacterial comparative genomes by Holt lab R R resources by Paul Vanderlaken Related post: R Tips and Tricks Blogdown, Hugo, Academic & R Markdown Blogdown: Creating websites with R Markdown by Yihui Xie Hugo Hugo discussion forum Hugo Academic by George Cushen Academic R Markdown Building your blog using blogdown by Marie Dussault Data Visualization Plotting trees + data by Holt Lab Blogging tips Lifehacker 6 tips for low-cost academic blogging by Matt Might Ready to start your data science blog?
